snippet: Ron Barber, whom former Representative Gabrielle Giffords picked as her successor, defeated his Republican rival on Tuesday in a closely followed special election.
abstract: Ron Barber, whom former Arizona Representative Gabrielle Giffords picked as her successor, defeats his Republican rival Jesse Kelly in a closely followed special election; the election is seen by many political strategists as testing ground for the power of national issues in deciding competitive races.

byline.original: By SARAH GARRECHT GASSEN and FERNANDA SANTOS
byline.contributor: Sarah Garrecht Gassen reported from Tucson, and Fernanda Santos from Phoenix.

lead_paragraph: Ron Barber, whom former Representative Gabrielle Giffords picked as her successor, defeated his Republican rival on Tuesday in a closely followed special election.

headline.seo: Democrat Wins Arizona Race to Succeed Gabrielle Giffords
headline.main: Arizona Race to Succeed Giffords Won by Democrat
headline.print_headline: Arizona Race To Succeed Giffords Won By Democrat
